title: A Promise That You Will Never Fall
description: Brother Carter shares about bitterness and being cut off from God through this sin. He encourages us on how to not fail in our Christian walk to not judge the body of Christ the precious Bride our Saviour bought with His blood. May we finish well in our Christian walk.

title: Avoiding Cynicism - Part 1
description: In this message, K.P. Yohannan warns us to avoid getting so familiar with the blessings of God that we begin to take them for granted. We need to remain trusting the Lord, knowing He is all we have.

title: Avoiding Cynicism - Part 2
description: K.P. Yohannan continues part 2 of his message and encourages us to realize how desperate we are for Christ and that we are to be consistently growing in Him; not being stagnant.

title: Avoiding Cynicism - Part 3
description: In the last part of his message, K.P. explains the importance of unity in the Body of Christ.
